name: A Life Learned
description:
You are highly encouraged to play in full screen mode

A game about foxes learning and teaching.

Controls

Moving - Left Click

Sprinting - Hold Shift (while moving)

Growling - Hold Right Click

Eating / Drinking - Hold Middle Mouse Button / Space Bar

Credits

Aarón Férreo - 3D modeling, texturing

Adrián González - Level design, programming

Mauro Rodríguez - Character rigging and animation, programming, particles

Bugs fixed:

* Now you can get to the final screen.

* Some animations are now correctly triggered.

* Sound issues fixed.

* Added a key binding to the Space Bar to drink, so that people with a mousepad or a mouse without middle button can play properly.
